revised_title: A Eleventh Memoir on Quantics: The Numerical and Real Generating Functions
tldr: The author presents a tenth memoir on quantics, focusing on the binary quintic and its covariants. The memoir discusses the Numerical Generating Function (N.G.F.) and the Beal Generating Function (B.G.F.) of covariants, as well as the theory of syzygies and segregates, and their applications to the canonical form of the quintic equation.
